entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Oromocto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:11 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, 6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Gagetown 07:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: 6.5°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 5.0°C
Wind: SW 18 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this morning. Clearing this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
